artist: Artist: Gabrielle Bell; Publisher: Gabrielle Bell , San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, blue and green background with images color photocopied on wove cover; 34 pp.
inscription: p. 1, black ink pen: Dearest Fly; Welcome to the Book of Sleep  Best / Wishes Gabrielle Bell
medium: Color and black-and-white photocopy; bound volume, leaves loose
title: Book of Sleep
